mapper.select: SELECT pod.pur_ord_code, pod.pur_ord_dtl_code, getitemName(pod.item_code) item_code, pod.quantity, pod.status, pod.reccv_date, po.exp_dlv_date, getEmpName(po.emp_id) emp_id, getvdrName(po.vdr_code) vdr_code FROM purchaseOrderDetail pod join purchaseOrder po on(pod.pur_ord_code=po.pur_ord_code) WHERE pod.com_id = 'com-101'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inbound(in_code, in_wh, out_wh, emp_id, created_date, note, com_id) VALUES #{inCode}, #{inWh}, #{outWh}, #{empId}, #{createdDate}, #{note}, 'com-101'
